mapper.select: select ORDER_NUMBER, USER_ID, BOOK_NUMBER, ORDER_ORDERER, ORDER_RECIPIENT,TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PAYMENTDATE, ORDER_RECEIPTADDRESS, ORDER_REQUIREMENT, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_QUANTITY, ORDER_ORDERNUMBER, ORDER_RECIPIENTPHONENUMBER from tbl_order

select sum(order_orderprice)as gross,to_char(order_date,'yyyy')as orderyear from tbl_order where to_char(order_date,'yyyy') > to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-4 and order_status='입금완료' group by to_char(order_date,'yyyy') order by orderyear

select sum(order_orderprice)as grossmonth, to_char(order_date,'mm')as ordermonth from tbl_order where to_char(order_date,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') and order_status='입금완료' group by to_char(order_date,'mm') order by ordermonth

select sum(o.order_orderprice)as grossforeign,to_char(o.order_date,'yyyy')as orderyearforeign, b.book_country from tbl_order o,tbl_book b where to_char(o.order_date,'yyyy') > to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-4 and o.order_status='입금완료' and o.book_number = b.book_number and b.book_country = '해외' group by to_char(o.order_date,'yyyy'),b.book_country order by orderyearforeign

select sum(o.order_orderprice)as grosskorea,to_char(o.order_date,'yyyy')as orderyearkorea, b.book_country from tbl_order o,tbl_book b where to_char(o.order_date,'yyyy') > to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-4 and o.order_status='입금완료' and o.book_number = b.book_number and b.book_country = '국내' group by to_char(o.order_date,'yyyy'),b.book_country order by orderyearkorea
